<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L121">interface <b>VirtualMachineDisk</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents">
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-attach">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L127">property <b>attach</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>attach?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

Attach an external disk instead of creating a new one.
Implies and conflicts with `keepOnRemove`. If set, you cannot set `size`,
`eagerlyScrub`, or `thinProvisioned`. Must set `path` if used.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-datastoreId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L132">property <b>datastoreId</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>datastoreId?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

The datastore ID that the ISO is located in.
Requried for using a datastore ISO. Conflicts with `clientDevice`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-deviceAddress">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L136">property <b>deviceAddress</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>deviceAddress?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

<elided>

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-diskMode">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L144">property <b>diskMode</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>diskMode?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

The mode of this this virtual disk for purposes of
writes and snapshotting. Can be one of `append`, `independentNonpersistent`,
`independentPersistent`, `nonpersistent`, `persistent`, or `undoable`.
Default: `persistent`. For an explanation of options, click
[here][vmware-docs-disk-mode].

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-diskSharing">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L149">property <b>diskSharing</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>diskSharing?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

The sharing mode of this virtual disk. Can be one
of `sharingMultiWriter` or `sharingNone`. Default: `sharingNone`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-eagerlyScrub">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L156">property <b>eagerlyScrub</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>eagerlyScrub?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

If set to `true`, the disk space is zeroed out
on VM creation. This will delay the creation of the disk or virtual machine.
Cannot be set to `true` when `thinProvisioned` is `true`.  See the section
on picking a disk type.  Default: `false`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-ioLimit">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L161">property <b>ioLimit</b></a>

<div class="pdoc-member-contents">

{{% md %}}

The upper limit of IOPS that this disk can use. The
default is no limit.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-ioReservation">

{{% md %}}

The I/O reservation (guarantee) that this disk
has, in IOPS.  The default is no reservation.

{{% /md %}}
</div>

level is `custom`.

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-ioShareLevel">

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-name">

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-path">

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-size">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L203">property <b>size</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">

{{% md %}}

The size of the disk, in GiB.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-thinProvisioned">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L210">property <b>thinProvisioned</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>thinProvisioned?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

If `true`, this disk is thin provisioned,
with space for the file being allocated on an as-needed basis. Cannot be set
to `true` when `eagerlyScrub` is `true`. See the section on picking a disk
type. Default: `true`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-unitNumber">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L218">property <b>unitNumber</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>unitNumber?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

The disk number on the SCSI bus. The maximum value
for this setting is the value of
`scsiControllerCount` times 15, minus 1 (so `14`,
`29`, `44`, and `59`, for 1-4 controllers respectively). The default is `0`,
for which one disk must be set to. Duplicate unit numbers are not allowed.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-uuid">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L223">property <b>uuid</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>uuid?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

The UUID of the virtual disk's VMDK file. This is used to track the
virtual disk on the virtual machine.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineDisk-writeThrough">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L229">property <b>writeThrough</b></a>
</h3>
<div class="pdoc-member-contents">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'></span>writeThrough?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</pre>
{{% md %}}

If `true`, writes for this disk are sent
directly to the filesystem immediately instead of being buffered. Default:
`false`.

{{% /md %}}
</div>
</div>

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineNetworkInterface-macAddress">

<h3 class="pdoc-member-header" id="VirtualMachineNetworkInterface-useStaticMac">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-vsphere/blob/a0e9f3f394ad39c7a129cd597da7a4271e4a9cfd/sdk/nodejs/types/input.ts#L283">property <b>useStaticMac</b></a>

{{% md %}}

If true, the `macAddress` field is treated as
a static MAC address and set accordingly. Setting this to `true` requires
`macAddress` to be set. Default: `false`.

{{% /md %}}

<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="VirtualMachineVapp">
